messages.subject: Re: OT, Madagascar Hissing Cockroaches
messages.msgSnippet: We have had our Madagascar Hissing Cockroach for almost a year. We got her when she was a baby and named her Hoover ( cause she vacuums up her food!). We feed
messages.messageBody:
We have had our Madagascar Hissing Cockroach for almost a year. We got her when she was a baby and named her Hoover ('cause she vacuums up her food!). We feed her vegetables and insect food called "Bug Bites" by Nature Zone. We have a lot of pets (a "family zoo") and she is one of my favorite animals. The first time she hissed at me,I was so startled because I did not expect her to be soooooo LOUD!!! lol

-Paula
Azure 13

> We're so excited about tomorrow, I just have to share...we're getting
> cockroaches!!!
> Madagascar Hissing Cockroaches, to be exact.

--
